C.zh_des: 每个人都需要的开源观察性平台！
C.name: netdata /netdata
C.description: The open-source observability platform everyone needs!

C.zh_des: Redis是一个驻留在磁盘上的内存数据库。数据模型是键-值，但支持许多不同类型的值：字符串、列表、集、排序集、散列、流、HyperLogs、位图。
C.name: redis /redis
C.description: Redis is an in-memory database that persists on disk. The data model is key-value, but many different kind of values are supported: Strings, Lists, Sets, Sorted Sets, Hashes, Streams, HyperLogLogs, Bitmaps.

C.zh_des: 新的可引导USB解决方案。
C.name: ventoy /Ventoy
C.description: A new bootable USB solution.

C.zh_des: Git源代码镜像-这是一个仅发布的存储库，但拉请求可以通过GitGitGadget(https://gitgitgadget.github.io/).)转换为邮件列表的补丁请按照文档/提交补丁程序进行任何改进。
C.name: git /git
C.description: Git Source Code Mirror - This is a publish-only repository but pull requests can be turned into patches to the mailing list via GitGitGadget (https://gitgitgadget.github.io/). Please follow Documentation/SubmittingPatches procedure for any of your improvements.

C.zh_des: 使用URL语法传输数据的命令行工具和库，支持DICT、FILE、FTP、FTPS、GOPHER、GOPHER、HTTP、HTTPS、IMAP、IMAPS、LDAP、LDAPS、MQTT、POP3、POP3S、RTMP、RTMPS、RTSP、SCP、SFTP、SMB、SMBS、SMTP、SMTPS、Telnet、TFTP、WS和WSS。Libcurl提供了大量强大的功能
C.name: curl /curl
C.description: A command line tool and library for transferring data with URL syntax, supporting DICT, FILE, FTP, FTPS, GOPHER, GOPHERS, HTTP, HTTPS, IMAP, IMAPS, LDAP, LDAPS, MQTT, POP3, POP3S, RTMP, RTMPS, RTSP, SCP, SFTP, SMB, SMBS, SMTP, SMTPS, TELNET, TFTP, WS and WSS. libcurl offers a myriad of powerful features

C.description: Port of OpenAI's Whisper model in C/C++

C.zh_des: 适用于基于ESP8266和ESP32的设备的替代固件，具有使用WebUI、OTA更新、使用定时器或规则的自动化、可扩展性以及对MQTT、HTTP、Serial或KNX的完全本地控制的轻松配置。完整文档，请访问
C.name: arendst /Tasmota
C.description: Alternative firmware for ESP8266 and ESP32 based devices with easy configuration using webUI, OTA updates, automation using timers or rules, expandability and entirely local control over MQTT, HTTP, Serial or KNX. Full documentation at

C.description: Jailed iOS app that can install IPAs permanently with arbitary entitlements and root helpers because it trolls Apple

C.zh_des: 恢复开发以前开源的Redis项目的新项目。我们将其命名为Valkey，因为它是键值数据存储的一个变种。
C.name: valkey-io /valkey
C.description: A new project to resume development on the formerly open-source Redis project. We're calling it Valkey, since it's a twist on the key-value datastore.

C.zh_des: Wazuh -开源安全平台。针对端点和云工作负载的统一XDR和SIEM保护。

C.zh_des: Flipper Zero固件中的DOM。给你的鳍状肢它真正渴望的力量和自由。让它向你展示它的真实面貌。不要耽搁，今天就切换到唯一真正的师父吧！
C.name: Flipper-XFW /Xtreme-Firmware
C.description: The Dom amongst the Flipper Zero Firmware. Give your Flipper the power and freedom it is really craving. Let it show you its true form. Dont delay, switch to the one and only true Master today!

C.zh_des: 可以使用任何Web浏览器作为图形用户界面，在后端使用您喜欢的语言，在前端使用HTML5，所有这些都在一个轻量级的可移植库中。
C.name: webui-dev /webui
C.description: Use any web browser as GUI, with your preferred language in the backend and HTML5 in the frontend, all in a lightweight portable lib.

C.zh_des: 针对CVE-2024-1086的通用本地权限提升概念验证漏洞，适用于v5.14和v6.6之间的大多数Linux内核，包括Debian、Ubuntu和KernelCTF。KernelCTF图像成功率为99.4%。
C.name: Notselwyn /CVE-2024-1086
C.description: Universal local privilege escalation Proof-of-Concept exploit for CVE-2024-1086, working on most Linux kernels between v5.14 and v6.6, including Debian, Ubuntu, and KernelCTF. The success rate is 99.4% in KernelCTF images.

C.zh_des: 🐬功能丰富、稳定且可定制的Flipper固件

C.zh_des: 带有KVM后端的VirtualBox。在我们目前的开发模式下，我们不能在这里轻松地接受Pull请求。如果您愿意提供帮助，请随时联系我们，我们很乐意找到解决方案。
C.name: cyberus-technology /virtualbox-kvm
C.description: VirtualBox with KVM Backend. With our current development model, we cannot easily accept pull requests here. If you'd like to contribute, feel free to reach out to us, we are happy to find a solution.

C.description: Exploit for 6.4 - 6.5 kernels and another exploit for 5.15 - 6.5
